Posts.Content: Jun 19, 2014 06:24AM ruppah_aa wrote: Hi im 24 years old, no family history of BC, single dont have kids.  I felt a lump on my left breast that really bothers me so i went to my doctor and had my breast US, it was found out in the result that i have 3 solid masses in my breast (2 left, 1 ryt) all are fibrocystic changes Birad 2 at the same time BIRAD 3, with a size of almost 1 cm each.  The doctor said that BIRAD 3 has 2% chance to be malignant. Should i worry much about it?? sometimes i self pity cause im very young, and i dont know what to do.. The doctor said to have me follow up check after 6 mos.. and the fact that sometimes i felt discomfort and pain in my breast, 6 mos for me is too long.. .. and is it ok to extract it???
Posts.Title: Waiting to have another mammo and US Ozzy74 barb1319
